title: 各位大大有什么好玩的整合包？
author: 道本自然

replies.txt_content:
1.10.2
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/farming-valley
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/age-of-engineering
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/forever-stranded
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/invasion
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/craft-of-the-titans
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/the-simple-life-2-hqm
1.7.10
https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... ct-ozone-2-reloaded
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/agrarian-skies-2
FTB整合
https://www.feed-the-beast.com/modpacks
这些国外整合包都需要正版账号+twitch账号+curse启动器，如果没有这些，建议下载服务端，服务端不需要去下载mod，只需要把config,scripts,这些文件复制到自己客户端就可以了，至于那个resources就不需要了，这个文件只是CMM-（自定义主界面存放图片位置）
